text.div:
Leptospirosis (Tests for Leptospira Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    23205-8 Leptospira sp DNA [Presence] in Body fluid by NAA with probe detection
    23206-6 Leptospira sp DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    35491-0 Leptospira sp DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    52988-3 Leptospira sp DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    52989-1 Leptospira sp DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    52990-9 Leptospira sp DNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    86730-9 Leptospira borgpetersenii sv Hardjo-bovis DNA [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86731-7 Leptospira sp DNA [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
